message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $150 is a bit too high for my budget. Would you consider $100?
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I can do $125, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice. $125 is closer, but I'm aiming for something closer to $110.  Would that work for you?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I can do $115, but I think I've already given you a pretty good deal.
